title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill. Cook sauce. Combine chicken with sauce and serve.
